shortContent:
It is immune
to Fear, Pinning, Insanity Points, and psychic powers used to
cloud, control, or delude its mind.
content:
The mind of a creature with this trait is beyond the petty
frailties and precarious sanity of a mortal mind. It is immune
to Fear, Pinning, Insanity Points, and psychic powers used to
cloud, control, or delude its mind.
